LocationNameSearchParameter

Parameter name:string

Searches based on the name field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?name={name}

ResourceLocation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesLocation
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: LocationNameSearchParameter
description: Searches based on the name field for the location record eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Location?name={name}
